templates.title: Basic Referral Request
templates.subject: Seeking Your Guidance for Opportunities at [Company Name]
templates.body:
Hi [Recipient's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to see if you might know of any job openings at [Company Name]. I am very interested in [specific role or department] and believe my skills in [your skills] would be a great fit.

Thank you for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]
[Your Mobile Number]
[Your Email]
[Your LinkedIn Profile]

templates.title: Referral Request with Resume
templates.subject: Request for Referral to [Position] at [Company Name]
templates.body:
Hi [Recipient's Name],

I hope you’re doing well! I am reaching out to ask if you could refer me for the [Position] at [Company Name]. I have attached my resume for your reference. With my background in [your experience/skills], I believe I could contribute positively to the team.

Thank you for considering my request!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Mobile Number]
[Your Email]
[Your LinkedIn Profile]
